Verses: 1 visuvaasaththil Balaveenamullavanai Serththukkollungal; Aanaalum Avanudaiya Mana Aiyangalaik Kutramaai Nirnayikkaamalirungal.
2 oruvan Endhap Padhaarththaththaiyum Pusikkalaamendru Nambugiraan; Balaveenano Marakkarigalai Maaththiram Pusikkiraan.
3 pusikkiravan Pusiyaadhirukkiravanai Arpamaayennaadhiruppaanaaga; Pusiyaadhirukkiravanum Pusikkiravanaik Kutravaaliyaagath Theerkkaadhiruppaanaaga; Dhevan Avanai Etrukkondaare.

4 matroruvanudaiya Velaikkaaranaik Kutravaaliyaagath Theerkkiradharku Nee Yaar? Avan Nindraalum Vizhundhaalum Avanudaiya Ejamaanukke Avan Uththaravaadhi; Avan Nilainiruthtdappaduvaan; Dhevan Avanai Nilainiruththa Vallavaraayirukkiraare.
5 andriyum, Oruvan Orunaalai Matroru Naalilum Viseshamaaga Ennugiraan; Veroruvan Ellaa Naatkalaiyum Sariyaaga Ennugiraan; Avanavan Thanthan Manadhile Muzhu Nichchayaththai Udaiyavanaayirukkakkadavan.

6 naatkalai Viseshiththukkollugiravan Karththarukkendru Viseshiththukkollugiraan; Naatkalai Viseshiththukkollaadhavanum Karththarukkendru Viseshiththukkollaadhirukkiraan. Pusikkiravan Dhevanukku Sthoththiranjseluththugirapadiyaal, Karththarukkendru Pusikkiraan; Pusiyaadhirukkiravanumkarththarukkendru Pusiyaadhirundhu, Dhevanukku Sthoththiranj Seluththugiraan.
7 nammil Oruvanum Thanakkendru Pizhaikkiradhumillai, Oruvanum Thanakkendru Marikkiradhumillai.
8 naam Pizhaiththaalum, Karththarukkendru Pizhaikkirom, Naam Mariththaalum Karththarukkendru Marikkirom; Aagaiyaal Pizhaiththaalum Mariththaalum Naam Karththarudaiyavargalaayirukkirom.
9 kiristhuvum Mariththormelum Jeevanullormelum Aandavaraayirukkumporuttu, Mariththum Ezhundhum Pizhaiththumirukkiraar.
10 ippadiyirukka, Nee Un Sagodharanaik Kutravaaliyendru Theerkkiradhenna? Nee Un Sagodharanai Arpamaai Ennugiradhenna? Naamellaarum Kiristhuvinudaiya Niyaayaasanaththirku Munbaaga Nirpome.
11 andhappadi: Muzhangaal Yaavum Enakku Munbaaga Mudangum, Naavu Yaavum Dhevanai Arikkaipannum Endru En Jeevanaikkondu Uraikkiren Enbadhaaik Karththar Sollugiraar Endru Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.
12 aadhalaal Nammil Ovvoruvanum Thannaikkuriththu Dhevanukkuk Kanakkoppuvippaan.

13 ippadiyirukka, Naam Inimel Oruvaraiyoruvar Kutravaaligalendru Theerkkaadhiruppomaaga. Oruvanum Than Sagodharanukku Munbaagath Thadukkalaiyum Idaralaiyum Podalaagaadhendre Theermaaniththukkollungal.
14 oru Porulum Thannile Theettulladhallavendru Karththaraagiya Yesuvukkul Arindhu Nichchayiththirukkiren; Oruporulaith Theettulladhendru Ennikkollugiravanevano Avanukku Adhu Theettulladhaayirukkum.
15 pojanaththinaale Un Sagodharanukku Visanamundaakkinaal, Nee Anbaai Nadakkiravanalla; Avanai Un Pojanaththinaale Kedukkaadhe, Kiristhu Avanukkaaga Mariththaare.
16 ungal Nanmai Thooshikkappada Idankodaadhirungal.
17 dhevanudaiya Raajyam Pusippum Kudippumalla, Adhu Needhiyum Samaadhaanamum Parisuththa Aaviyinaalundaagum Sandhoshamumaayirukkiradhu.
18 ivaigalile Kiristhuvukku Oozhiyanjseygiravan Dhevanukkup Piriyanum Manusharaal Angigarikkappattavanumaayirukkiraan.
19 aanapadiyaal Samaadhaanaththukkaduththavaigalaiyum, Anniyonniya Bakthiviruththi Undaakkaththakkavaigalaiyum Naadakkadavom.
20 pojanaththinimiththam Dhevanudaiya Kiriyaiyai Azhiththuppodaadhe. Endhap Padhaarththamum Suththamulladhudhaan; Aanaalum Idaralundaagap Pusikkiravanukku Adhu Theemaiyaayirukkum.

21 maamsam Pusikkiradhum, Madhupaanampannugiradhum, Matredhaiyaagilum Seygiradhum, Un Sagodharan Idarugiradharkaavadhu, Thavarugiradharkaavadhu Balaveenappadugiradharkaavadhu Edhuvaayirundhaal, Avaigalil Ondraiyum Seyyaamaliruppadhe Nanmaiyaayirukkum.
22 unakku Visuvaasamirundhaal Adhu Dhevanukkumunbaaga Unmattum Irukkattum. Nalladhena Nichchayiththa Kaariyaththil Thannaik Kutravaaliyaakkaadhavan Baakkiyavaan.
23 oruvan Samusayappadugiravanaaip Pusiththaal, Avan Visuvaasamillaamal Pusikkirapadiyinaal, Aakkinaikkullaagath Theerkkappadugiraan. Visuvaasaththinaale Varaadha Yaavum Paavame.
